answer: The pulsation properties of SX Phe variables provide insight into their evolutionary history in Galactic Globular Clusters and Local Group dwarf galaxies (astro-ph/0102029).
explanation: This paper presents a detailed linear, nonadiabatic pulsational scenario for SX Phoenicis variables in Galactic Globular Clusters and Local Group dwarf galaxies, discussing how their pulsation properties can constrain their evolutionary history.
